name: Storage - Auction Wars
description:
It is the moment!!! The moment to get down and have some real business!!!! Do you want to enter the biggest and by far most spectacular virtual world of storage??? Then start biding in Storage - Auction Wars and become the richest person in the world.

You have to believe in you and Storage - Auction Wars will give you the opportunity to play against highly skilled and shrewd opponents. You also have the opportunity to use your strategic and financial skills to walk away with a chunk of money. Enter the auction and take on your rivals, think fast and walk away rich!!!! Discover the secrets the storage units hold and get the chance to collect rare items.

WORLD WIDE LOCATIONS!
Revel in the incredible experience that the real-life setting provides in different cities in the world: win all the auctions and receive access to hidden locations!

UNIQUE ARTIFICIAL BRILLIANCE!
Use your best financial thinking! Test your skills and become a real tycoon!

THOUSANDS OF EXCLUSIVE ITEMS!
Enjoy awesome items, including specials and rarities!

GORGEOUS GRAPHICS!
Feast your eyes on pixel-perfect images! Eye candy!

FANTASTIC ACHIEVEMENTS!
Accomplish challenging tasks and receive awesome awards! Impress your friends!

Once!!!!! Twice!!!!! Victory!!!!!!
